channel.title: Auto Talker?
channel.description: Where would be a good place for me to get a auto talker for runescape? please post here the link to it or description of it and area :)

item.title: Auto Talker?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“speedster239, post:3, topic:192138”]Robot class lets you take full control of the keyboard/mouse and take a bufferedimage of the screen, it’s a pretty nice addition to java although I don’t use it for what I do often. So you can move the mouse, type and analyze pixels to write image recognition/color recognition systems.

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/awt/Robot.html[/quote]I’m going to make him one next time I’m at his house that won’t use the mouse, so he can minimize it etc etc

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Talker?
item.dc:creator: @speedster239 speedster239
item.description:
@speedster239 wrote:

Robot class lets you take full control of the keyboard/mouse and take a bufferedimage of the screen, it’s a pretty nice addition to java although I don’t use it for what I do often. So you can move the mouse, type and analyze pixels to write image recognition/color recognition systems.

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/awt/Robot.html

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Talker?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Ummm, Here? There’s a section here for SCAR which has some good scripts as far as I know, I haven’t used it since a while ago.

And I told you, I’ll make you one in Java if you want. It’s not any harder than using java.awt.Robot…

But ya, if you want any bots for runescape, you can look in the SCAR/SRL section.

Read full topic
